title: How to Make Quince Snow

steps.headline: Boil in a heavy-based saucepan until tender.
Remove from heat and allow to cool until they can be handled.
Push the quinces through a sieve or blend.
Whisk the mixture until it becomes a stiff froth.
Pile into a glass dish and put in the refrigerator to chill.

text: Quarter the quinces.  Boil in a heavy-based saucepan until tender.  Remove from heat and allow to cool until they can be handled. Peel. Push the quinces through a sieve or blend.  Sweeten to taste.  Add the egg whites.  Whisk the mixture until it becomes a stiff froth.  Pile into a glass dish and put in the refrigerator to chill.  Serve chilled.
